(Damn, Orchid! Is the Beach the only place you know? I thought they would g=
o find a nice secluded place and work out their differences! Man!)
  ----- =
Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
  Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 8:21 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *In=
fectra nods to Stranato*

  Infectra: I agree with that.




  *Blizzard st=
arts walking for the beach while holding Sinister's hand*




  *Twister si=
ts at a table inside the base and sits her hands on the table and bangs her=
 head on it and sits there*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THE=
CODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 8:02 PM
 =
   Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    "We must do something, the Maximals we=
 have never betrayed, we must go to them." Stranato said.

    Sinister nod=
ded to Blizard, he held her hand and started to walk to wherever Blizzard w=
anted to go...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: iloveallliza=
rds 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 5:08 P=
M
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      Blizzard: Hmm...If you think yo=
u don't need healing than we shall be off.

      *Blizzard says to Siniste=
r*

      *Twister walks into the base*



      Infectra: I don't think we=
 can change the way they act...If we do that they'll just go as before....T=
hat doesn't mean we totally shouldn't try it.....*sigh*

      *Infectra sa=
ys while frowning*
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THEC=
ODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 5:=
24 AM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        Sinesis goes to the CR =
Chamber to get healed.

        "Why when we can go now?" Sinister asked Bl=
izzard.

        "I guess so, now that our friends are gone I don't know wh=
ere we should go." Stranato said to Infectra.

        "We never betrayed t=
he Maximals, you think they's want us back?" Airbomber asked.

        "The=
y ignored our talent before, what makes you think it'll be any different th=
is time?" Stranato asked.

        "You can fake amnesia." Airbomber sugges=
ted.

        "It's stupid, but it might work." Stranato said...
          =
----- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          To=
: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 4:58 AM
       =
   Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          *Infectra looks around and sighs=
 while looking at the ground and the sky and the bushs*

          Infectra=
: I wonder how'll we'll start...and what we'll eat......

          *Infect=
ra sighs and frowns*



          Blizzard: Yeah!

          *Blizzard says=
 quickly and evilly*

          Blizzard: That's perfect. But first you sho=
uld get into prime condition. A small trip to the CR Chamber wouldn't hurt,=
 would it?

          *Blizzard says in a nice jolly tone to Sinister*


  =
        Twister: I'll see if I see you...

          *Twister says to Sines=
is as she gets closer to the Base*

          *Twister looks back at Sinesi=
s and just stares. Than she looks at Blizzard and Sinister and frowns barin=
g her teeth and turning away*
            ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
         From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sen=
t: Friday, July 28, 2000 2:05 AM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


=
            Stranto sighed. He hoped they weren't running along, skipping m=
errily to their dooms.

            "I hope not, dear." Airbomber said to I=
nfectra.

            Sinister smiled wickidly to Blizzard.

            "L=
ike a quiet spot nobody knows about?" He asked. Sinesis groaned. He worried=
 about his brother's virginity for a while...
              ----- Original =
Message ----- 
              From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
              Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 12:18 AM
         =
     Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              *Blizzard breaks the kiss*=
 (OOC:If it wasn't already broken)

              Blizzard: Want to go some=
where after you get healed up?

              *Blizzard asks Sinister*


  =
            *Twister looks at Blizzard and Sinister and frowns with a big s=
igh. She than stands up walks closer to the Base with her head lowered*


 =
             *Infectra sighs*

              Infectra: I hope that the wind=
 isn't a tornado.

              *Infectra closes her optics*

            =
  Infectra: Now where are heading? Which way?

              *Infectra asks=
 Airbomber while pointing her extended finger around*

--------------------=
--------------------------------------------------------



---------------=
-------------------------------------------------------------
